https://www.foody.vn/quang-ngai/thanh-ti.user_comment: Husband wanted to try quang ngai‚Äôs specialty which is don. I never had it before so couldnt really compare it. It is a broth dish with clam like meat, scallions, thin flat noodles and slice onions. The taste is not too bad. You eat it with banh trang crush and place inside the soup bowl. I wouldnt mind having it again. The location is 5-10mon walk from our hotel. Plenty of seatings and the place is half full of locals. They also serve other dishes such as mi vit, mi quang, bun thit nuong, and vit lon. A con is the bowl size for this dish is small, didnt really fill us up. The bowl only cost 15k so not too bad for the price.
